HtmlFieldTrumbowygEditorSettings.Options:
{
    semantic: {
        'b': 'strong',
        'i': 'em',
        's': 'del',
        'strike': 'del',
        'div': 'div'
    },
    tagsToKeep: [
      "area",
      "base",
      "br",
      "col",
      "embed",
      "hr",
      "img",
      "input",
      "param",
      "source",
      "track",
      "wbr",

      "div",
      "iframe",
      "form"
    ],
    autogrow: true,
    btns: [
        ["viewHTML"],
        ["undo", "redo"],
        ["heading", "paragraph", "fontSize"],
        ["fontWeight"],
        ["foreColor", "backColor"],
        ["links"],
        ["image"],
        ["align"],
        ["list", "bulletList", "numberList"],
        ["sectionBreak"],
        ["removeformat"],
        ["fullscreen"],
        ["accordion"],
        ["tabs"]
    ],
    btnsDef: {
        align: {
            dropdown: ["justifyLeft", "justifyCenter", "justifyRight", "justifyFull"],
            ico: "justifyLeft"
        },
        image: {
            dropdown: ["insertMedia", "youtubeLink"],
            ico: "insertImage"
        }
    },
    plugins: {
      colors: {
          colorList: [
            '0b0c0c',
            '626a6e',
            '1d70b8',
            '003078',
            '4c2c92',
            'b1b4b6',
            'ffdd00',
            'd4351c',
            
            '003a69',
            '347ca9',
            
            '00703c',
            '5694ca',
            'f3f2f1',
            'ffffff',
            '6f72af',
            '912b88',
            'd53880',
            'f499be',
            'f47738',
            'b58840',
            '85994b',
            '28a197',
          ]
      }
  }
}
